Student_Cohort__Abstract_Object.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

Student_Cohort__Abstract_ObjectID.description: The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.

Student_Cohort__Abstract_Object.description: Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

Cohort_Membership_for_Applicant_Data.description: Student Cohort Assignment Data for Applicant

validation.validation: Specify another date. The Application is already a member of the cohort for the selected date.
To add the applicant, specify an add date that's after the latest assignment date.
Specify another date. The Application is not a member of the cohort for the selected date.
To remove the applicant, specify a removal date that's after the latest assignment date.
Specify an application that hasn’t already matriculated.
Specify an Assignment Date that is on or before Today’s Date.
Specify add or remove assignment types. You can’t specify an override or temporary override for student applicant cohorts.
Specify an Assignment Date that is on or after the application date.
Ensure that the application is active before you add applications to the cohort. You can't add applications that are withdrawn, canceled, or members of an application grouping that is closed.

description: Cohort Membership for Applicants Data Element

validation.validation: [applicant] already has an assignment request. You can’t submit multiple requests for the same applicant in a student cohort.
